entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
